tool_description: Get the latest Currency rates for 100+ currencies. Updated every 60 Minutes.
name: Currency Exchange Fx
title: Currency Exchange Fx

api_list.name: Converter
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the converted amount in a specified currency.

required_parameters.name: from_currency
required_parameters.description: The currency symbol from which the amount needs to be converted

required_parameters.name: to_currency
required_parameters.description: The Currency symbol in which the amount needs to be converted

required_parameters.name: from_value
required_parameters.description: The Amount to be converted in base currency
